cause.description:
The societys Light The Night Walk is the nation's night to pay tribute and bring hope to people battling cancer. The anual event brings communities together to celebrate and commemorate lives touched by leukemia, lymphoma and myeloma.
1. Providing critical information and support for patients and their families
2. Advocating for issues impacting blood cancer patients
3. Relentless for the cures because the need is critical
cause.mission: Cure leukemia, lymphoma, Hodgkinns disease, and myeloma and improve the quality of life of patients and ttheir families.
cause.name: The Leukemia & Lymphomia Society Light The Night Walk
